attributes.action: The PM must do TV debates. He must answer to the public, not pick and choose.
attributes.additional_details: The people want TV debates, the PM can not simply pick and choose what he wants. He answers to the public, he is a public servant. He needs to stand up and speak to the public in the several TV debates. I want the government to stand up and be accountable for their time in power and to be seen publicly answering questions in each and every debate.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Prime Minister's office alone.
